name: Lime Crema
description: Here's an easy recipe for a zippy version of Lime Crema.  If you use yogurt as the base it's worth adding in a bit of fat (mayo or cream) as it will vastly improve the flavor.  So good!
recipeIngredient: juice of  1 lime (plus more to taste)
pinch of  salt (plus more to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients to a blender or food processor and combine well.  Add a splash of water if it isn't combining well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the ingredients to a blender or food processor and combine well.  Add a splash of water if it isn't combining well.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste for seasoning and heat.  I added another pinch of salt and another squeeze of lime to this batch.
